summary: This is Mofomojo\'s Exousia4869\'s Chinese Stealth Ring. Essentially, made because I gave some bad advice to Exousia4869 assuming some other things had been tested, and decided to make sure that the advice I followed up with worked. Ver 4.0. Interaction with the environment and attacking will no longer dispel the effects.
descriptionHtml:
==============
Sunnie\'s Ring of Woe (Formerly: Exousia4869\'s Chinese Stealth Ring) ver 4.0
By: MofoMojo
==============

==============
Description
==============
This is Mofomojo\'s Ring of Sunnie\'s Woe, formely known as Exousia4869\'s Chinese Stealth Ring. Essentially, made because I gave some bad advice to Exousia4869 assuming some other things had been tested, and decided to make sure that the advice I followed up with worked. 

http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/543667-need-help-with-mod/page__view__findpost__p__4421286

When you crouch wearing this ring, you\'ll turn invisible. This is a nod to the Chinese Stealth Suit from Fallout (which I\'ve never heard of....the suit...not Fallout). :)

==============
Features
==============
You should turn invisible when you crouch, while wearing this ring. 


================
Current Version Changes
================
4.0 
This has turned into a VERY powerful ring of invisibility. Now, when wearing the ring, and sneaking, you will be invisible. PERIOD. Interactions with the environment, attacking, and the like WILL NOT disrupt the effect. Go forth and wreck havoc. 

3.0
While interacting with objects in the world will dispel the effect, it will be recast immediately. No need to stand up and sneak again. 

2.0 
Now that the CK is released, no more trickery with the console is required.

1.1
Prevents the problem of having to remove and re-equip the ring if you attack or interact with the world. 

1.0

================
HOW TO INSTALL
================

Note:
If you have a previous version. I suggest removing the ring from your inventory and saving the game before using this one. 


--------------
==Plugin==
--------------
-Open the Skyrim launcher
-Click on data files
-Check \"MM_SunniesWoe\"

---------
==In Game==
---------
You can craft this at the forge with a Silver Ingot and Vampire Dust.
author: MofoMojo
